name: grand-stack-starter
description: This project is a starter for building a GRAND Native Web (GraphQL, React, Apollo, Neo4j Database, React-Native-Web) application. There are two components to the starter, the UI application (a React/React Native app) and the API app (GraphQL server).

scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap && cd ./packages/api && yarn && cd ../../packages/client && yarn & cd ../../
